targets.rawSql:
select tsapvsite sito, tsapvndis promo , tsapvdescndis descr, tsapvtrt flg_trt, count(tsapvcexr) nr_art 
from tin_data_promotion_out tdpo 
where tsapvdcre >= current_Date
and  not exists ( select 1 from boss.tesi_initiative where sz_host_id= tsapvndis)
group by tsapvsite, tsapvndis , tsapvdescndis  , tsapvtrt

panels.title: Promozioni  in interfaccia non presenti su CAMPAIGN MANAGER

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 'tmd_sale_codes_var' tab, tsc2.network_id, tsc2.sale_code, tsc2.code_type_pc, count(*)
FROM tmd_sale_codes_var tsc2
WHERE current_date  between tsc2.start_date  and tsc2.end_date and sale_Code not like '799%' collate case_like 
group by  tsc2.network_id, tsc2.sale_code, tsc2.code_type_pc
having count(*) > 1
union
SELECT 'tmd_sale_codes' tab,tsc2.network_id, tsc2.sale_code, tsc2.code_type_pc, count(*)
FROM tmd_sale_codes tsc2
WHERE current_date  between tsc2.start_date  and tsc2.end_date  and sale_Code not like '799%'  collate case_like 
group by  tsc2.network_id, tsc2.sale_code, tsc2.code_type_pc
having count(*) > 1

panels.title: Barcode validi in data su più articoli

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  'tmd_sale_codes_var'tab, min(id) idmin ,max(id) idmax ,item_sale_id,network_id , code_type_pc, plu_code, tsc2.sale_code,count(*)
    FROM tmd_sale_codes_var tsc2
    WHERE current_date  between tsc2.start_date  and tsc2.end_date 
    group by  item_sale_id,network_id , code_type_pc, plu_code, tsc2.sale_code
   having count(*) > 1
   union
   SELECT 'tmd_sale_codes'tab,  min(id) idmin ,max(id) idmax ,item_sale_id,network_id , code_type_pc, plu_code, tsc2.sale_code,count(*)
    FROM tmd_sale_codes tsc2
    WHERE current_date  between tsc2.start_date  and tsc2.end_date 
    group by  item_sale_id,network_id , code_type_pc, plu_code, tsc2.sale_code
   having count(*) > 1

panels.title: Barcode multipli validi a parità di articolo

targets.rawSql:
select item,network_code,description,sale_code, to_char(start_date,'dd-mm-yyyy') start_Date,to_char(end_date,'dd-mm-yyyy') end_Date  
from boom.tin_trace_sale_code_boss
where end_date < current_Date 
and processing_status <> 1

SELECT 'tmd_sale_prices_var' tab, min(tsc2.id) idmin ,max(tsc2.id) idmax ,ti.item, item_sale_id ,vat_id, network_id ,
 sale_price_type_pc,promo_code, count(*)
    FROM tmd_sale_prices_var tsc2,
        tmd_item_sales tis ,
        tmd_items ti
    WHERE current_date  between tsc2.start_date  and tsc2.end_date 
    and    tis.id = tsc2.item_sale_id
     and ti.id = tis.item_id
    group by  ti.item, item_sale_id ,vat_id, network_id,sale_price_type_pc,promo_code
   having count(*) > 1    
   union
   SELECT 'tmd_sale_prices' tab, min(tsc2.id) idmin ,max(tsc2.id) idmax ,ti.item, item_sale_id ,vat_id, network_id ,
 sale_price_type_pc,promo_code, count(*)
    FROM tmd_sale_prices tsc2,
        tmd_item_sales tis ,
        tmd_items ti
    WHERE current_date  between tsc2.start_date  and tsc2.end_date 
    and    tis.id = tsc2.item_sale_id
     and ti.id = tis.item_id
    group by  ti.item, item_sale_id ,vat_id, network_id,sale_price_type_pc,promo_code
   having count(*) > 1

panels.title: Prezzi vendita multipli validi a parità di articolo

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 'tmd_purchase_prices' tab, min(tsc2.id) idmin ,max(tsc2.id) idmax ,ti.item,item_logistic_id, operational_agreement_id ,network_id , promo_Code, count(*)
    FROM tmd_purchase_prices tsc2,
        tmd_items ti
    WHERE current_date  between tsc2.start_date  and tsc2.end_date 
     and ti.id = tsc2.item_id
    group by  ti.item,item_logistic_id, operational_agreement_id ,network_id , promo_Code
   having count(*) > 1    
   union 
 SELECT 'tmd_purchase_prices_var' tab, min(tsc2.id) idmin ,max(tsc2.id) idmax ,ti.item,item_logistic_id, operational_agreement_id ,network_id , promo_Code, count(*)
    FROM tmd_purchase_prices_var tsc2,
        tmd_items ti
    WHERE current_date  between tsc2.start_date  and tsc2.end_date 
     and ti.id = tsc2.item_id
    group by  ti.item,item_logistic_id, operational_agreement_id ,network_id , promo_Code
   having count(*) > 1

panels.title: Prezzi di acquisto multipli a parità di articolo

targets.rawSql:
select 'tmd_orderable_assortments_var' tab, item_id,item_logistic_id,logistic_unit_id,operational_agreement_id, network_id ,count(*)
from tmd_orderable_assortments_var toav where 1=1 
and current_date between start_date and  end_date
group  by item_id,item_logistic_id,logistic_unit_id,operational_agreement_id, network_id 
having count(*)>1
   union
select 'tmd_orderable_assortments' tab, item_id,item_logistic_id,logistic_unit_id,operational_agreement_id, network_id ,count(*)
from tmd_orderable_assortments toav where 1=1 
and current_date between start_date and  end_date
group  by item_id,item_logistic_id,logistic_unit_id,operational_agreement_id, network_id 
having count(*)>1

panels.title: Assortimenti multipli validi a parità di articolo stesso fornitore

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    t.tab,
    t.conta
FROM
(
    -- Query principale che unisce tutti i conteggi
    SELECT 'boom.tmd_orderable_assortments_var' AS tab, COUNT(*) AS conta
    FROM boom.tmd_orderable_assortments_var tppv 
    WHERE end_date < start_date 
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 'boom.tmd_orderable_assortments' AS tab, COUNT(*) AS conta
    FROM boom.tmd_orderable_assortments tppv 
    WHERE end_date < start_date 
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 'boom.tmd_purchase_prices_var' AS tab, COUNT(*) AS conta
    FROM boom.tmd_purchase_prices_var tppv 
    WHERE end_date < start_date 
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 'boom.tmd_purchase_prices' AS tab, COUNT(*) AS conta
    FROM boom.tmd_purchase_prices tspv 
    WHERE end_date < start_date 
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 'boom.tmd_sale_prices_var' AS tab, COUNT(*) AS conta
    FROM boom.tmd_sale_prices_var tspv 
    WHERE end_date < start_date 
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 'boom.tmd_sale_prices' AS tab, COUNT(*) AS conta
    FROM boom.tmd_sale_prices tspv 
    WHERE end_date < start_date 
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 'boom.tmd_sale_codes_var' AS tab, COUNT(*) AS conta
    FROM boom.tmd_sale_codes_var tspv 
    WHERE end_date < start_date 
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 'boom.tmd_sale_codes' AS tab, COUNT(*) AS conta
    FROM boom.tmd_sale_codes tspv 
    WHERE end_date < start_date 
) AS t
WHERE
    t.conta > 0;

panels.title: Potenziali problemi gestione in data - Se maggiore di zero da verificare

targets.rawSql:
select 'TMD_ITEM_ANAG: Articoli non presenti' tab, count(ti.item) from tmd_items ti where not exists (select 1 from tmd_item_anag tia  where tia.item_id = ti.id) 
union 
SELECT 'TMD_ITEM_ANAG: Articoli con prezzo vendita valido non present o errato 'tab, COUNT(*) FROM tmd_item_anag tia WHERE  sale_price_type_pc = 1 and EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tmd_sale_prices tsp WHERE   tsp.sale_price_type_pc = tia.sale_price_type_pc and tsp.network_id = tia.network_id  AND coalesce(tia.sale_price,0) <> coalesce(tsp.price,0)AND tsp.item_sale_id = tia.item_sale_id AND current_date BETWEEN start_date AND end_date)
union 
SELECT  'TMD_ITEM_ANAG: Articoli con EAN valido non presente o errato'tab, COUNT(*) FROM tmd_item_anag tia  WHERE  tia.sale_code IS NULL  AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM  boom.tmd_sale_codes tsc  WHERE coalesce(tsc.network_id,0) = coalesce (tia.network_id ,0) AND tsc.item_sale_id = tia.item_sale_id AND current_date BETWEEN tsc.start_date AND tsc.end_date );
